com.ashwin.fri.genetic

Class GeneticChromosome

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ashwin.fri.genetic.GeneticChromosome

  • public class GeneticChromosome
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GeneticChromosome(GeneticDecoder decoder, boolean[] genome)
      Creates a new GeneticChromosome from a specified bit array.
      GeneticChromosome(GeneticDecoder decoder, int bits)
      Creates a new GeneticChromosome with the specified number of randomized bits.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getFitness() 
      java.lang.String getGenotype()
      Returns a bit string representation (true = '1' and false = '0') of the underlying bit array.
      GeneticChromosome[] mate(GeneticChromosome othr, double rate)
      This method mates this chromosome with a given chromosome.
      void mutate(double rate)
      This method randomly flips bits in the genome based on a specified mutation probability.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GeneticChromosome

        public GeneticChromosome(GeneticDecoder decoder,
                 int bits)
        Creates a new GeneticChromosome with the specified number of randomized bits. This constructor is used to generate the initial population.
        Parameters:
        bits - number of bits

      • GeneticChromosome

        public GeneticChromosome(GeneticDecoder decoder,
                 boolean[] genome)
        Creates a new GeneticChromosome from a specified bit array.
        Parameters:
        genome - bit array

    • Method Detail

      • getFitness

        public double getFitness()

      • getGenotype

        public java.lang.String getGenotype()
        Returns a bit string representation (true = '1' and false = '0') of the underlying bit array.
        Returns:
        bit string

      • mate

        public GeneticChromosome[] mate(GeneticChromosome othr,
                       double rate)
        This method mates this chromosome with a given chromosome. The specified crossover rate determines the likelihood that single-point crossover will occur between the two chromosomes. This method returns an array containing two offspring.
        Parameters:
        othr - other parent chromosome
        rate - crossover probability
        Returns:
        offspring chromosomes

      • mutate

        public void mutate(double rate)
        This method randomly flips bits in the genome based on a specified mutation probability. The greater the mutation rate, the more likely mutations will occur.
        Parameters:
        rate - mutation probability
